name: Brazil data cube
description: Production, visualization and analysis of large volumes of remote sensing images modeled as multidimensional data cubes for the entire Brazilian territory.

name: Innovalab - Peru
description: Web for georeferenced field data collection, using statistical methods for sampling in Peru, providing a comprehensive audit of climate, health and sociodemographic databases.

name: Global Health Resilience
description: GHRtools workshop materials for spatiotemporal exploratory analysis and Bayesian modelling of health data developed at the Barcelona Supercomputing Center within the IDExtremes project.
